channel.title: Vps questions
channel.description: when i pay for vps what do i do? can i still make updates? please help

item.title: Vps questions
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

when u pay for vps, it takes about 1-5 biznes days for them 2 set it up for u
yes you can make updates, use windows VPS, if ur using windows XP on ur comp, using the remote desktop connection program
log into ur vps, after its setup theyâ€™ll give u the info.
while in there, this is how u get ur server on it

upload it to uppit on ur normal computer
then on ur vps, download it
then delete the link so no1 can find it

then run the server, if u ever want to change something, conect to ur vps, and basicly its just like using ur own computer

Read full topic
